oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Robinson's Drugstore in Dayton

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Drugstores
Dayton (Tenn.); Rhea County (Tenn.); Scopes, John Thomas; Drugstores
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: TSLA Staff
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Fred Robinson, the drugstore owner, attempted to capitalize on the trial by proudly advertising his drugstore as the place "where it started." John Scopes and town officials met here and posed for photographs for the media. The drugstore went out of; business in 1982.
